name: aesthetic-ai
description: Application de médecine esthétique avec simulation IA

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && pytest" "cd frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && cp .env.example .env
